title: Troubleshoot SSO Configuration
description: A customer who configured SSO themselves reports it is not working.

tasks.description: Review the SSO configuration settings the customer entered into the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant has access to the customer's current settings.

tasks.description: Compare the customer's settings against the metadata from their Identity Provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant finds a typo in the 'Entity ID' field.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of the typo and have them correct it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer corrects the typo, and SSO begins working.
